segments.text: Do you hear what happened to Sally ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She had to go to the hospital .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She passed out in class . Seems she hadn't eaten anything in days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why on earth would she do that ? You mean that she intentionally did not eat any food for days ? That's crazy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , but that's what she did .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't believe that there are girls who are willing to do that to their bodies . And all for a certain look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's not just the girl â€™ s fault . It's also society's fault - magazines and ads that show - thin models all saying , It's in to be thin . It's hard for them not to listen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: True , but there are limits . Being thin is one thing ; starving oneself to death is another . No one forces them to do this .
segments.speaker: S2
